page.title: 11COWES TRADE
page.content: RESULTS OF AN INTERVIEW IN COWES: {What are the advantages of working on {the Island?}Debatable.As we know, factories on the Island are not stable,due to the cost of bringing raw materials to the Island and we have had the highest rate of unemployment in England in the past.Environmentally it is also debatable.We have great natural facilities but the arts are sadly lacking and it depends what one wants in life.{ { Have you any ambitions for yourself {or your business?}My own ambition is to help improve Cowes for everyone both socially and economically. {Do you depend on the sea for your {business?}The whole Island does,and always has done,sometimes to its detriment in progress,commerce etc.
